About the game (The Drifter*):

ul.li: Description: The Drifter is a 2d point and click adventure in the classic style. Taking cues from the recent revival of the genre there is an emphasis on story, with puzzle solving being the glue that ties it together rather than the focus. Mick's a pretty practical guy, and so puzzles are down-to-earth, designed to be unobtrusive, and give an investigative feel. We're keeping the pacing is quick and lean, you'll never be wandering around lost for long periods - Mick is propelled through the story at a good clip, from one situation to another, with barely a moment to catch his breath.

div.p: * Any information about the offer is automatically grabbed and may in rare cases not match the correct game.

About the game (Tank! Tank! Tank!*):

ul.li: Ratings: IGDB Meta 51 % (7 sources) / IGDB User 61 % (4 sources)

Description: Players will find an armament of tanks and weapons at their disposal to dispatch the enemy threat, including mechanical insects, gigantic dragons and even other players. Team up with three other friends to battle with or against each other in fully destructible environments in a variety of action-packed story and multiplayer modes where weapons are never in short supply and threats are hiding behind every corner. Players will be able to arm their tanks with lasers, machine guns, missile pods, the dreaded Colossus Missile along with power-ups scattered throughout each map.

About the game (Classic Game*):

ul.li:
Description: The game is about the hermit returning to a land now ravaged by curses. It uses a custom combat system, and there are many hidden events to experience.
Lose Reasons-to-live, become cursed, meet a girl, consume human souls, die in more than a few ways; experiment to find secrets, strange interactions & rebukes.

About the game (Home Game*):

ul.li: Description: Home Game is about the hermit at home. Explore town, find ways into buildings, die horribly, fail utterly, cash cans for change, regret your decisions in life. The game features magic spells, a cat, rude people, demons and death. You can pass through solid objects. You can help end this world. You may grow flowers in your garden, as well as feed birds. It has rain SFX.

About the game (Home Game 2*):

ul.li: Description: Home Game 2 is about the hermit selling his home. Explore town, hop fences to enter yards, acquire cursed swords, ruin your mood by mis-using magic spells, die over and over and over again. Never find your way. This hectic masocore features scrolls, portals, demons and death. Drink coffee across 8 levels and try to survive your stalker. Achieve a perfect homesense score. Can you reach the truest ending?
